price: О народе мој! Ко би ме од Аллаха одбранио кад бих их отерао? Зашто не размислите?!
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi man yanṣurunī mina al-lahi in ṭaradttuhum afalā tadhakkarūna
